report.title: My Ordeal
report.author: Anarchist hippy
report.bodytext: /n /n /n What a trip man I've done a lot of stuff but I never ODed before. It started when I took between 12 and 15 vivarin at my dads. He drove me home and the ordeal began. /n /n T+30 min Everything was distorted and I was cold so damn cold. /n /n T+180 min Mom came home and I told her I was sick. /n /n T+300 min It just hit hard. I puked. It burned my throat all the way up I feared for my life and began to read my bible as I sure as hell wasn't gonna sleep for a long ass time. The Tv froze and didn't work except for one channel that had my beloved Indians losing at the world series. /n /n T+480 min Fell asleep into a hellish uncomfertable ordeal. /n /n 3:AM I wake up and throw up everywhere. I go eat but when I stand up I puke it back up mom said I don't have to go to school so I spend the day vomiting when I stand up. /n /n NOON Started vomiting BLOOD, dark black blood, likely from acid burning my gut. /n /n Next day I came down but still have pain. /n /n AGE 12
